page.title: 10Prestwood - Peers & Reading
page.content:
79 children have 1 sister 19 children have 2 sisters 1 child has 3 sisters 1 child has 4 sisters
75 children have 1 brother 20 children have 2 brothers 2 children have 3 brothers
_______________________________________ Reading - 42 boys have a regular comic and 30 girls have a regular comic. 43 boys do not have a regular comic and 57 girls do not have a regular comic.
23 children do not have a regular comic and read no books over the Summer holiday 1985. 16 children do have a regular comic but read no books over the Summer holiday 1985.
